name: House1
_source: speak;OldMan1;Oh my, what a surprise to see other folks in these sacred lands.|I don't get many visitors these days since the woods have been infested with monsters.|Well, I do have an interesting rumor to share with you.|There have been strange sounds coming from a <red>cave hidden behind a mountain range to the north</>.|It's almost as if the earth itself is bracing itself for another holy crusade.|Perhaps you may find something of value in that cave?|You'd best prepare yourself thoroughly, however.|I wish you good luck in your upcoming battle.|Oh, how do I know about that?|Let's just say I'm rooting for your success.
